totalcross.net.ssl

Class SSLServer

  • totalcross.lang.Object
    • totalcross.net.ssl.SSLCTX
      • totalcross.net.ssl.SSLServer

  • public class SSLServer
extends SSLCTX
    The server context. All server connections are started within a server context.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public SSL connect(Socket socket)
            throws IOException,
                   NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                   CryptoException
        Establish a new SSL connection to an SSL client. It is up to the application to establish the initial socket connection. Call dispose() when the connection is to be removed.
        Parameters:
        socket - [in] A reference to a totalcross.net.Socket.
        Returns:
        An SSL object reference.
        Throws:
        IOException
        CryptoException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
